mapper.select: select soe.row_id as rowId , soe.name as name , soe.ou_type_cd as ouTypeCd from landing.S_ORG_EXT soe where soe.OU_NUM = #{dealerCode} order by soe.created desc
mapper.insert: insert into landing.S_ORG_EXT_XM ( created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by , par_row_id , NAME , type , ATTRIB_02 , ATTRIB_12 ) VALUES ( now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' , #{rowId} , #{name} , 'Dealer Local Holiday' , #{holidayDescription} , to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') );
mapper.delete: delete from landing.S_ORG_EXT_XM where par_row_id = #{rowId} and name = #{name} and type = 'Dealer Local Holiday' and ATTRIB_12 = to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
